entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Flurries beginning near midnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this evening then southwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 18 February 2023
